name: tm31
effect: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Mud-Slap Gen I: Mimic)

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Destroys barriers like LIGHT SCREEN and causes damage.
flavor_text.emerald: Destroys barriers like LIGHT SCREEN and causes damage.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: An attack that also breaks any barrier like LIGHT SCREEN and REFLECT.
